CustomField.description: Solutions Required cannot be blank when setting opportunity to stage 'Closed Won'.
CustomField.formula: IF( OR( AND( NOT(OR(ISPICKVAL(Sales_Office__c, "San Mateo"),ISPICKVAL(Sales_Office__c, "San Carlos"))), ISBLANK(TEXT(Solutions_Required__c)), One_off__c > 0), AND( NOT(OR(ISPICKVAL(Sales_Office__c, "San Mateo"),ISPICKVAL(Sales_Office__c, "San Carlos"))), ISBLANK(TEXT(Solutions_Required__c)), ISPICKVAL(Type,"New Business-Enterprise Cloud"))), IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0150P000005PRcW", "NO"), IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0150P000005PRdt","YES"))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Green: Okay Red: Select a value in the 'Solutions Required' field
CustomField.label: Check - Solutions Required
